amendment.description: To provide tax relief to growers affected by citrus canker.

vote.text: Amendment SA 649 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 649 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Graham FL. (consideration: CR S6451-6456; text: CR S6455) To provide tax relief to growers affected by citrus canker.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 649 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 649 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Graham FL.
